description: Give these Smoky chicken meatballs a go – they are a cinch to make, the fam will love them, and they'll be on the table in 30 minutes flat.
name: Smoky Chicken Meatballs Recipe | Woolworths
recipeCategory: Kids light meal & snack,Fresh Food Kids

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 240°C/220°C fan-forced. Line 2 baking trays with baking paper. Place mince, egg, breadcrumbs, paprika, onion and 2 garlic cloves in a large bowl and mix well to combine.
Roll level tablespoonfuls chicken mixture into balls. Place on tray. Spray lightly with oil.
Bake for 15 minutes or until golden and cooked through.
Combine yoghurt, remaining garlic, mustard powder and chives in a small bowl. Serve meatballs with cucumber, celery and yoghurt sauce.
